name: Rats Attack
description:
Like casual games ? So get ready ! Rats Attack is a very fun game ! * There are 45 challenging levels incredible ! * There modified mice that will help you or hinder you in this adventure! * There are 135 stars to unlock during this journey ! * Survivor Mode : See who is the best among your friends ! INSTRUCTIONS : Rats will invade your home and your yard during the day , afternoon, evening , and you like a cat aims to stay awake for that not to happen and eliminates them . For this you must drag the mice of the same color through the tail , organizes them and followed them for capture sequence colors !

Download:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.com.jymidiaglobal.ratsattack
